DOC.brief_summary: Drug dissolution vivo play crucial role bioavailability therapeutic orally administer solid dosage form . The aim study evaluate pharmacokinetics standard paracetamol tablet comparison oral solution Chinese healthy volunteer . Based Noyes-Whitney equation pharmacokinetics parameter , investigator trend propose method estimate vivo dissolution time dissolution kinetics solid dosage form .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Standard Paracetamol Tablet Oral Solution After Oral Administration Chinese Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Sex : Male female ( limited PK study ) 2 . Healthy volunteer , age : 1845（medical history , physical examination , vital sign , ECG lab test qualify screening） 3 . Body Mass Index（BMI）:19~24 body weight less 50Kg 4 . Nonpregnant woman confirm pregnancy test 5 . Vital Signs : 3 minute supination , follow measurement criterion within range : body temperature ( axillary temperature ) , 36.0~37.0 ℃ ; blood pressure , SBP 90~140mmHg（12.0~18.7kpa）and DBP 60~90mmHg（8.0~12.0kpa） ; arterial pulse : 60~100 bpm 6 . Nonhypersensitivity product similar product 7 . Nonsmoker , nonalcoholic 8 . Subject must able sign Inform Consent prior participation study 9 . Subject must able communicate investigator comply study protocol . Subjects meet one several follow criterion exclude : 1 . Subjects fail physical examination 2 . Pregnant nursing woman 3 . Administration know drug cause damage organ within 3 month 4 . Administration prescription drug nonprescription drug 2 week initial dose 5 . Before initial dose , participation clinical trial within 3 month 6 . Blood donation 3 month study , plan blood donation one month study 7 . Diagnosis clinical evident diseases 2 week initial dose 8 . Primary disease vital organ 9 . Physically mentally disable 10 . Medical history specific allergy ( asthma , measles , eczematous dermatitis ) , know allergic similar ( include excipients ) 11 . Any surgical internal medicinal condition might cause damage study subject change absorption , distribution , metabolism elimination investigational drug , include : inflammatory intestinal syndrome , peptic ulcer , alimentary tract hemorrhage history severe gastrointestinal tract operation , gastrectomy , gastrosmoty / jejunostomy large bowel resection history hepatic disease laboratory examination finding ALT , AST , γGT TBili show clinically significant abnormality liver history renal disease laboratory examination finding creatinine , urea nitrogen , albuminuria show clinically significant abnormality kidney urination disorder dysuresia . 12 . A history immunological deficiency disease , HIV positive 13 . HBV HCV positive 14 . Women undergone menstrual period study 15 . Consumption significant amount smoke drinking , drink 28 unit alcohol per week ( 1 unit : 285ml beer , 25ml liquor , 1 glass wine ) , smoke 2 cigarette 16 . Frequent use sedative , hypnotic , stabilizer addictive drug 17 . Consumption 8 cup tea , coffee , caffeine beverage 18 . Unable complete study others reason . 19 . Investigators .
